column1: * [[Gondor]] reaches the height of its power.<ref name="AppB">{{App
* About this time a [[shadow]] falls on [[Mirkwood
column2: Greenwood]], and [[men]] begin to call it [[Mirkwood]].<ref name="AppB">{{App

column1: * The [[Periannath]] are first mentioned in records, with the coming of the [[Harfoots]] to [[Eriador]].<ref name="AppB">{{App
